results.title: Evaluation of the Effectiveness of Post-Stroke Metformin Treatment Using Permanent Middle Cerebral Artery Occlusion in Rats
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ size was similar to that noted in the pMCAO without @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group 48 h after occlusion (Figure 2a).

results.title: Metformin prevents stroke damage in non-diabetic female mice with chronic kidney disease
results.text_hl: Pre-conditioning with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ did not influence striatal @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ volumes in any of the groups.

results.title: Neuroprotective Effects of Long-Term Metformin Preconditioning on Rats with Ischemic Brain Injuries.
results.text_hl: Compared with the @DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@MCAO@@@ group, the pre-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ + @DISEASE_Infarction_Middle_Cerebral_Artery @DISEASE_MESH:D020244 @@@MCAO@@@ group also had decreased neurobehavior scores and @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ area in the brain.

results.title: Administration of Metformin Rescues Age-related Vulnerability to Ischemic Insults through Mitochondrial Energy Metabolism
results.text_hl: The results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment significantly reduced @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ size in both young and aged hearts (Figure 2B).

results.title: Metformin enhances neural precursor cells migration and functional recovery after ischemic stroke in mice.
results.text_hl: What's more, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment also significantly reduced the @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ volume and alleviated functional dysfunction after @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@.

results.title: Preconditioning and anti-apoptotic effects of Metformin and Cyclosporine-A in an isolated bile duct-ligated rat heart.
results.text_hl: These significant decreases were abolished in the IPC (BDL) group. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ significantly decreased the @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ size and apoptotic indices compared with I/R (BDL) and normal groups, while @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@CsA@@@ led to similar decreases except in the level of @GENE_CASP3 @GENE_25402;64044 @@@caspase-3 and -8@@@.
